title: Ciara Ft Justin Timberlake - Love Sex and Magic (Single)
description:
"Ciara Featuring Justin Timberlake-Love Sex and Magic (NEW FANTASY RIDE SINGLE)"



Artist: Ciara Ft. Justin Timberlake
Album: Fantasy Ride (2009)
Format: MP3
Type: Song - Single





""Love Sex Magic" is the second US single from Ciara's third studio album, Fantasy Ride, and the lead single for the album elsewhere. The single was co-written by and features Justin Timberlake with production coming from new production group The Y's. After receiving heavy airplay on US radio from March 3, 2009, it was made available for download in Australia, New Zealand, Canada and the US from March 17. It was released as a download in the UK and Europe on April 5, 2009."



Chart Performance (US*):
=====================
U.S. Billboard Hot 100	/10
U.S. Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs	/83
U.S. Billboard Pop 100	/10
=====================
